trans-unit.source: Represents an XML element that contains the settings for a [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] service, as well as endpoints that expose the service.
trans-unit.target: 表示 XML 項目，其中包含的設定[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]服務，以及會公開服務的端點。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceElement"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceElement"></xref> class with the type of the service to be instantiated.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceElement"></xref>来具現化的服務類型的類別。

trans-unit.source: The type of the service to be instantiated.
Gets or sets a string that contains the behavior name of the behavior to be used to instantiate the service.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定字串，包含要用來具現化服務之行為的行為名稱。

trans-unit.source: The behavior name of the behavior to be used to instantiate the service.
trans-unit.target: 要用來具現化服務之行為的行為名稱。

trans-unit.source: The behavior name must be in scope at the point the service is defined.
trans-unit.target: 行為名稱必須是在定義服務之處的範圍內。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string.
Gets a collection of endpoints exposed by this service.
trans-unit.target: 取得由這個服務公開的端點的集合。

trans-unit.source: Each endpoint has its own address and binding.
trans-unit.target: 每個端點都有自己的位址和繫結。

trans-unit.source: All bindings used within the configuration file must be defined in the scope of the file.
trans-unit.target: 使用組態檔中的所有繫結必須定義在檔案範圍中。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceEndpointElementCollection"></xref> that contains one or more endpoints exposed by this service.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceEndpointElementCollection"> </xref> ，包含由這個服務公開的一或多個端點。

trans-unit.source: Gets a configuration element that specifies the host of this service instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定的主機，此服務執行個體的組態項目。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.HostElement"></xref> that specifies the host of this service instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.HostElement"> </xref> ，指定這個服務執行個體的主機。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unique name of this service.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定此服務的唯一名稱。

trans-unit.source: The unique name of this service.
